creditAccount(address).details: Credits account. You could credit yourself or someone using this.

creditAccounts(address[]).details: Credits player as though player manually credits themselves.

getBalance(address).notice: returns the balance of a wallet account

getTotalBalance().notice: returns the ether balance of this wallet contract

withdraw(uint256).notice: Allows you to withdraw a specified amount of your wallet balance

withdrawAll().notice: Allows you to withdraw all your wallet balance

userdoc.notice: TODO: Move to orisirisi-contracts since it could be globally scoped
